articles.description: The Bill actor Jeff Stewart, who played PC Reg Hollis on the popular series, sports a very different look now than his time on the programme
articles.content:
The Bill fans will know Jeff Stewart as PC Reg Hollis but the actor sports a very different look to his days as the clean-cut police officer.

articles.title: Codebreakers decipher Mary, Queen of Scots' secret letters 436 years after her execution - The Register
articles.description: Digital sleuths chop through crypto challenge in 'surreal' search
articles.content:
A team of codebreakers discovered and then cracked  more than 50 secret letters written by Mary Stuart, Queen of Scots while she was imprisoned in England by her cousin, Queen Elizabeth I.

articles.title: Netflix's affable killer defies death and cancellation in last season of You - Financial Times
articles.description: Cartoonish satire and tasteless entertainment meet as Joe sets his sights on London socialites
articles.content: An irredeemably trashy series about an affable sociopath who stalks and murders young women, Netflixs You has managed to make it to a fourth and final season without facing cancellation of any kind.… [+1865 chars]
